title: Teamwork-Based Digital Problem-Solving Competency Enhancement Course

context.prior_knowledge: Basic digital tool proficiency and elementary education experience
context.additional_context: Team-based problem-solving activities in a simulation environment using the STEAM approach

learning_goals: Learners can proactively propose three or more problem-solving strategies within a team setting
Learners can analyze social issues and derive solutions through collaboration with peers using VR simulations
Learners can autonomously manage team project schedules and roles using digital collaboration tools
Learners can implement two or more communication strategies to resolve conflicts during team activities
difficulty: Hard - Complex requirements with multiple constraints
